title: What Year Do You Think This Will Begin to Happen ?
description:
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

Listen on Spotify: 
https://open.spotify.com/show/2faAYwvDD9Bvkpwv6umlPO?si=8Q3ak9HnSlKjuChsTXr6YQ&dl_branch=1

🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast

transcription: {"text": "In the future, when we have AI that is good enough to where you can't tell the difference, so meaning like an actual android that can pass the Turing test and men can have sex with it, right? You've already got fans that are having sex with Transformers now, right? So here's the thing, when you think about our ancestors a hundred years ago, bro, why do you shave so much? You're in the shower, you shower every day, you brush your teeth. They would look at us like, what a, you guys are so weak. I can't believe you eat. You have all your teeth. You guys are weak. A hundred years from now, we're going to be looking at like our kids are like, you guys robots. That's so weird. But to them, it won't be weird. Cause you want to know what the alternative is. Women who don't accept them, women who said that look down on them. You don't make enough money. You're too short. And they're going to grow up. And they're like on their 16th birthday, they get to play boy, bunny robots, and they start them. Then one day they go out to the club after when they're in college and they have to talk to a real woman and be like, it was nice to meet you. Thank you for the drink and walks up. They're like, I'm going to go by robots. I'm going to go the robot.
